00043 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateFileIdTest()
00044 {
00045         std::string filename = "generic_update_fileid_test";
00046         CreateTestFile(filename, "");
00047 
00048         // Read in the file
00049         GenericData data;
00050         GenericFileReader reader;
00051         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00052         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00053 
00054         // Get the file Id
00055         AffymetrixGuidType fileId = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId();
00056 
00057         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fileId.length() > 0);
00058 
00059         // Update the 
00060         std::ofstream os;
00061         os.open(filename.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00062 
00063         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00064         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00065         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00066 
00067         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00068         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()));
00069 
00070         os.close();
00071 
00072         // Now read the file again.
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00074 
00075         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId() == newFileId);
00076         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileTypeId() == "funky file");
00077 }
00078 
00079 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateTestFile(const std::string& name, const std::string& fileId)
00080 {
00081         FileHeader fh;
00082         fh.SetFilename(name);
00083         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId("funky file");
00084 
00085         if (fileId.length() != 0)
00086                 fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileId(fileId);
00087 
00088         GenericFileWriter writer(&fh);
00089         writer.WriteHeader();
00090 }
00091 
00092 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateFileIdFailTest()
00093 {
00094         std::string filename = "generic_update_fileid_test";
00095         CreateTestFile(filename, "fake file id");
00096 
00097         // Read in the file
00098         GenericData data;
00099         GenericFileReader reader;
00100         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00101         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00102 
00103         // Get the file Id
00104         AffymetrixGuidType fileId = data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId();
00105 
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(fileId == "fake file id");
00107 
00108         // Update the 
00109         std::ofstream os;
00110         os.open(filename.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00111 
00112         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00113         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00114         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00115 
00116         // Should not update unless the current and new file ids are the same length.
00117         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00118         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()) == false);
00119 
00120         os.close();
00121 }

00123 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::CreateTestFileWithParameters(const std::string& name)
00124 {
00125         FileHeader fh;
00126         fh.SetFilename(name);
00127         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileTypeId("funky file");
00128         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->SetFileCreationTime(DateTime::GetCurrentDateTime().ToString());
00129 
00130         ParameterNameValueType nvt;
00131         nvt.SetName(L"Float");
00132         nvt.SetValueFloat(4.5f);
00133         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00134         nvt.SetName(L"String");
00135         nvt.SetValueText(L"not updatable");
00136         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00137         nvt.SetName(L"Integer");
00138         nvt.SetValueInt32(56);
00139         fh.GetGenericDataHdr()->AddNameValParam(nvt);
00140 
00141         GenericFileWriter writer(&fh);
00142         writer.WriteHeader();
00143 }
00144 
00145 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateMatchingParameterTest()
00146 {
00147         std::string filename = "generic_update_parameter_test1";
00148         CreateTestFileWithParameters(filename);
00149 
00150         // Read in the file
00151         GenericData data;
00152         GenericFileReader reader;
00153         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00154         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00155 
00156         ParameterNameValueType nvt1;
00157         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt1));
00158         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueText() == L"not updatable");
00159         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt1));
00160         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueFloat() == 4.5f);
00161         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt1));
00162         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueInt32() == 56);
00163 
00164         // Update the parameter list
00165         std::ofstream os;
00166         os.open(filename.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00167 
00168         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00169         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00170         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00171         ParameterNameValueType nvt2;
00172         nvt2.SetName(L"Float");
00173         nvt2.SetValueFloat(5.7f);
00174         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00175         nvt2.SetName(L"String");
00176         nvt2.SetValueText(L"updatable");
00177         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00178         nvt2.SetName(L"Integer");
00179         nvt2.SetValueInt32(112);
00180         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00181 
00182         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00183         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()));
00184 
00185         os.close();
00186 
00187         // Now read the file again.
00188         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00189 
00190         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId() == newFileId);
00191 
00192         ParameterNameValueType nvt3;
00193         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt3));
00194         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueText() == L"updatable");    // the string is shorter so it can be updated.
00195         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt3));
00196         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueFloat() == 5.7f);
00197         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt3));
00198         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueInt32() == 112);
00199 }
00200 
00201 void GenericDataHeaderUpdaterTest::UpdateNonMatchingParamterTest()
00202 {
00203         std::string filename = "generic_update_parameter_test2";
00204         CreateTestFileWithParameters(filename);
00205 
00206         // Read in the file
00207         GenericData data;
00208         GenericFileReader reader;
00209         reader.SetFilename(filename);
00210         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00211 
00212         ParameterNameValueType nvt1;
00213         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt1));
00214         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueText() == L"not updatable");
00215         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt1));
00216         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueFloat() == 4.5f);
00217         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt1));
00218         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt1.GetValueInt32() == 56);
00219 
00220         // Update the parameter list
00221         std::ofstream os;
00222         os.open(filename.c_str(), std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::in);
00223 
00224         AffymetrixGuidType newFileId = AffymetrixGuid::GenerateNewGuid();
00225         GenericDataHeader updateHdr;
00226         updateHdr.SetFileId(newFileId);
00227         ParameterNameValueType nvt2;
00228         nvt2.SetName(L"Float");
00229         nvt2.SetValueInt32(57);
00230         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00231         nvt2.SetName(L"String");
00232         nvt2.SetValueText(L"really not updatable");
00233         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00234         nvt2.SetName(L"Integer");
00235         nvt2.SetValueInt16(112);
00236         updateHdr.AddNameValParam(nvt2);
00237 
00238         GenericDataHeaderUpdater updater;
00239         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(updater.Update(os, updateHdr, *data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()));
00240 
00241         os.close();
00242 
00243         // Now read the file again.
00244         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.ReadHeader(data));
00245 
00246         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->GetFileId() == newFileId);
00247 
00248         ParameterNameValueType nvt3;
00249         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"String", nvt3));
00250         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueText() == L"not updatable");
00251         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Float", nvt3));
00252         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueFloat() == 4.5f);
00253         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.Header().GetGenericDataHdr()->FindNameValParam(L"Integer", nvt3));
00254         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(nvt3.GetValueInt32() == 56);
00255 }
